title: Meta launches new California PAC to back pro-AI political candidates
description: Meta launched a new Super PAC in California to support political candidates who back pro-artificial intelligence policies and oppose strict regulation.
content:
Meta Platforms, Inc., the parent company of Facebook and Instagram, is launching a new political action committee to back candidates in California who support pro-artificial intelligence policies and oppose strict regulation.

title: Anthropic reaches a settlement over authors' class-action piracy lawsuit
description: The move means the company will avoid a potentially more costly ruling if the case regarding its use of copyright materials to train artificial intelligence tools had moved forward.

title: Moment Trump suddenly halts Cabinet meeting to tout bromance with Mark Zuckerberg
description: Donald Trump took time out of his hours-long Cabinet meeting on Tuesday to show off a printout of the massive size of Facebook's new Artificial Intelligence data center.
content:

title: Here’s what we know (and don’t know) about AI and jobs
description: A report out of MIT last week claimed that 95 percent of companies had wasted money with failed projects relying on generative artificial intelligence apps. Someone should have read the fine print.

title: UN creates Artificial Intelligence advisory panel
description: UN General Assembly creates AI advisory body to address concerns about technology's impact on democracy and human rights.
content:
The UN General Assembly on Tuesday (August 26, 2025) created an Artificial Intelligence (AI) advisory body to help countries make decisions about the revolutionary technology.
